query: What are the effects of painting gum solutions on rough bark for captive primates?
relevant_summary: No evidence was captured for the effects of painting gum solutions on rough bark for primates [1325]. Related actions also had no captured evidence on effects: adding gum solutions to drilled hollow feeders [1326] and providing gum (including artificial gum) [1330].
